title: Scammer_Vladislav_A
author: Scammer_Vladislav_A
content: Does anybody knows information about the persons in charge of the criminal facility https://www.finanssivalvonta.fi?Also I wonder what will happen of all the bitcoins localbitcoins.com has scammed their user?Do they give share to Finanssivalvonta?Beware of Finanssivalvonta and Vladislav Alimpiev its scam.I have send Finanssivalvonta an email but they dont even reply, and I cant even find a complete address of it only P.O. Box 103, 00101 Helsinki.
